english.segment1: I was all on my own with nowhere to run to. On the day You found me. And the more that I pray, the more that I hear You. And the more I believe. That no one else could hold me like You do. We're never apart
english.segment2: Chorus: I want to tell You. I want to let You know. And I want to show You the way I feel for You. I didn't know You. Now anyone can see. You are my God. And You found me
english.segment3: I will never deny the way that You lead me. With the love that's so rare. So I made up my mind whenever You need me. I will always be there. And no one else could hold me like You do. We're never apart
english.segment5: And every day I'm gonna say how I'm feeling. In every way I want to show how I care. My life was all wrong, but I know from now on. I'll never stop loving You
